rev.desc.rev.desc: caused by 71595, panel build.gui.1, if value is null, will not set to captions.
When modifying columns in a QBE for which the underlying table is a joindef, no indication of internal tables and field names are available to help users select proper columns.
This saves the original value of the joinfile name
this way the name of the original filename will be used regardless of whether or not it is a joinfile.
changed the 'no records' exit on the select.dbdict panel from 'no.dbdict.msg' to 'init.joindef' (this inits the joindefs file)
-this exits to 'check.joindef' where the joindef is searched for based on the joinfile name passed into the application

-if a record is found then it exits to get.filename. This panel gets the first file listed in the joindef found and creates a query to use on the following panel 'get.file'. This panel pulls the dbdict based on the first filename listed in the joindef record
from here the application takes the check.gui exit and continues along normally.

This saves the original value of the joinfile name
this way the name of the original filename will be used regardless of whether or not it is a joinfile.
changed the 'no records' exit on the select.dbdict panel from 'no.dbdict.msg' to 'init.joindef' (this inits the joindefs file)
-this exits to 'check.joindef' where the joindef is searched for based on the joinfile name passed into the application

-if a record is found then it exits to get.filename. This panel gets the first file listed in the joindef found and creates a query to use on the following panel 'get.file'. This panel pulls the dbdict based on the first filename listed in the joindef record
from here the application takes the check.gui exit and continues along normally.
